participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and playful, Emily enjoys spending time with friends and family. She loves to explore new activities and is always eager to learn.
participant_1.background: I try to keep up with my family by texting them frequently and calling them on the phone. I drive a big truck. I am 10 years old. I love spending time with friends who have kids of their own, because we can relate to each other and enjoy the same activities. Pizza is my favorite.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Practical and hardworking, Jake values family and enjoys creating things. He takes pride in his strength and craftsmanship.
participant_2.background: My car is my most valued possession because it allows me to travel to and from work and to enjoy my favorite pastime, watching sports. I can also squat 400 pounds. I enjoy making things for my family. I live in Texas. I am allergic to dust.

content.text: Not too bad, it's a little cold out here in Texas, but other than that I'm good.
I know, it's been pretty chilly lately. I'm just hanging out today with my family.
That's nice, I don't get to see my family much. I live in a pretty small town and they all live in different states.
Oh, that's a shame. I'm really close with my family, so I try to call them or text them every day.
That's good that you're so close to them. I try to call my mom as often as I can, but I'm not always so good about it.
I know what you mean, it can be hard to keep up with everyone. But it's worth it to stay in touch.
Yeah, you're right. I'll try to call her more often.
Good! So, what do you like to do for fun?
I like to make things for my family. I'm pretty good at woodworking, so I like to build things like furniture and toys.
That's really cool! I wish I was that crafty.
It's not that hard, you just have to practice.
Maybe I'll give it a try sometime.
You should! It's a lot of fun.
Okay, I will. Thanks for the suggestion.
